entry.title: UWELL CROWN 5 TANK (CRC compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Uwell
Type:
Price: 39.99

Whether you are an experienced or a beginner vaper, you should check out Uwell's Crown 5 for multiple vape experiences. You can get excellent flavor and vape thanks to its compatibility with multiple mesh coils. You can either choose a single mesh coil if you love a smooth DTL vape. With a range of 65-70 W, you get a burst of smooth rich flavor while using a single mesh coil. For restricted DTL, Uwell recommends a dual mesh coil. With the latter, you are guaranteed to enjoy a warm and flavor-saturated vape at lower wattages. Lastly, a triple mesh coil supports a slightly tight airflow for huge vapor and a slightly strong throat hit. Uwell's exquisite manufacturing technology gives you a high-quality vape tank made from stainless steel that is meticulously polished to give you a smooth feel and a bright luster to prevent damage. Introducing the self-cleaning technology, the crown 5 atomizer utilizes the e-juice in the condensation holder to lessen juice leakage and consequent cleaning. It further utilizes a cap design that has been optimized to allow you to refill your e-juice with ease. With a quarter-turn commonly known as 90 degrees turn, you are ready to refill your tank through a filler hole that has extra safety, check valve, to prevent further leakage. Crown 5 - Uwell also features a pro-FOCS Flavor Testing technology that optimizes the e-juice flavors.

Available in Black and Stainless

Cross compatible with all of the excellent PnP coils and the PnP pods (Drag S/X pods), the PnP tank makes use of both with the addition of a sturdy 510 adapter and AFC ring.

entry.title: Joytech eGrip Replacement Coils
entry.summary:
Vendor: joytech
Type:
Price: 7.50

The construction of the eGrip CS head is completely different compared to other Joyetech atomizer heads, so it only works with select devices. It has a resistance of 1.5Ω. Note: It can work under high voltage and wattage. (3.5v - 5.5v)

Changing eGrip Coils: To begin, simply unscrew the bottom cap with a coin. The atomizer head will be located on the base of that bottom cap. Twist/Unscrew the atomizer head and replace it with a fresh new one.

entry.title: Uwell Crown 2 Replacement Coil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Uwell
Type:
Price: 10.00

Uwell Crown 2 Replacement Coil Heads – 0.25 ohms 

100% Genuine Uwell.  Dual parallel wrapped vertical coils with low sub-ohm 0.25 ohm resistance.  Unique bullet-shape means positive connector is a cone which allows for more direct airflow and allows the coil to heat up more evenly.  Produces awesome clouds, great flavour and are long lasting.  New Ultra-Smooth Airflow Design.  High wattage operating range (from 60W to 100W).  Vertical design for best capillary action and greater wick saturation.  Imported organic cotton.

Fits the Uwell Crown 2 Sub-Ohm Tank

This is a 5 pack of ceramic donut coils for your Yocan Cerum.  These coils have a resistance of 0.8ohm, quick heat up time and will provide clean tasty hits and big vapour. The air inlets are placed on the sides of the ceramic cup, which avoids the wax leaking from the bottom onto the coil. Rated for 15-25W.

entry.title: Caliburn G Pod Device (CRC compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Uwell
Type: Pod device
Price: 39.99

The authentic Uwell Caliburn G Pod Kit is the upgrade version of Caliburn, works with 690mAh built-in battery, and can fire up to max 15W output. Caliburn G Kit with a pocket-friendly single button layout design provides a simple interface, plus an easy-to-use pod system, making it a perfect start for beginner vapers.

Caliburn G has a lightweight frame and slim design, very easy to carry. Uwell Caliburn G Pod kit can vape directly through the air pressure sensor or manual button to start vaping. It comes with 2.0ml capacity with top-fill and leakproof design. Uwell Caliburn G pod supports two different airflows: restricted DTL vaping (when the air inlet of the pod and the air inlet of the device are close to each other) and MTL vaping (when the air inlet of the pod and the air inlet of the device are far away from each other).

IMPORTANT:

  • Fully charge before first use.
  • A purchaser and user of rechargeable batteries should educate themselves on rechargeable batteries.
  • Do not use any rechargeable battery or charger if any visible damage is present, or if known mishandling, accidental or otherwise, has occurredWe are not responsible for any damage. caused by the misuse or mishandling of rechargeable batteries.
  • Always store and transport rechargeable batteries in a safe, non-conductive container
  • Never charge batteries to 4.3V or above.
  • Never short (connect positive and negative size) battery.
  • Never keep a spare battery loose in a pocket, purse, etc. and always use protective cases.
  • Never carry bare cell in your pocket with keys, change or any other metal objects.
  • Never keep this battery together with metal objects (short circuit can happen if you do).
  • Do not expose to heat.
  • .Do not use any rechargeable battery or charger if any visible damage is present, or if known mishandling, accidental or otherwise, has occurred.
  • Warning: Lithium ion batteries may explode or burn due to improper use. Using these batteries for purposes not intended by the manufacturer, including outside a battery pack and/or without a BMS, may cause severe injury and damage. We are not responsible for any injuries caused by lithium ion batteries – use at your own risk.

entry.title: VOOPOO Drag 2 PnP Refresh Edition Kit in CRC Version
entry.summary:
Vendor: VOOPOO
Type: MOD
Price: 65.99

VOOPOO Drag 2 Refresh Edition Kit in CRC Version is a new version of VOOPOO Drag 2 with the difference that it comes with PNP Pod Tank. The exquisite and artistic Drag 2 Refresh Edition has an ergonomic portable design and has unique aesthetics and usability. Two external 18650 batteries (NOT INCLUDED) provide max 177W power output. At the same time, 5-177W can adjust the power to find the best flavor for you. Drag 2 Refresh Edition uses innovative GENE.FIT chip with FIT function. The GENE.FIT Chip is dynamic and quite efficient with battery efficiency, and it has the powerful performance of fast ignition and high burst, and also supports intelligent identification of coil, to preventing the coil from burning out, with the addition of multiple output power adjustments such as Flavor Set, Cloud Set, and Battery Set.

VOOPOO PNP Pod Tank is a new type of Tank, which can be flexibly switched between POD and TANK, with a capacity of 4.5ml, and double intake hole design. It matches perhaps the most abundant and excellent PnP coils; Magnetic absorption makes coil change and oil filling never so simple; The adjustable air 510 base matches almost all of your devices. Drag 2 Refresh Edition equipped with two PnP coils of 0.15ohm and 0.2ohm. They will let you feel the PnP coils of a big cloud with incredible flavors. Drag 2 Refresh Edition also compatible with all PnP coils.

entry.title: Coil Master 521 mini V2 OHM meter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Coil Master
Type: OHM reader
Price: 10.00

Driven by a single 18650 battery, Coil Master 521 mini V2 is a handy compact device for all vapers.
It is a multi-functional device that acts as an ohm meter, voltage drop checker, rebuilding station and firing test station.
The 521 mini V2 is able to measure the resistance down to 0.05 ohm, and dry fire their coils down to 0.1 ohm as well.
Reverse battery protection and short circuit protection are also built in for safty use.

Features
– Ohm meter
– Coil rebuilding deck
– Coil burning
– Reverse battery protection
– Short circuit protection
– Battery out put voltage testing
– PCB Heat protection

Specification
– Resistance Measuring Range: 0.05-9.9ohm(Error±0.05ohm)
– Resistance rate: 0.1ohm
– Connection: 510 threaded with spring loaded pin
– Battery: Single 18650 battery driven (Battery is not included)

General specifications
Dimension: 80mm x 80mm x 28mm
Weight: 80g
Housing material: ABS

Packing
1x User Manual
1x 521 Mini V2

entry.title: Vandy Vape Pulse BF 80W Box Mod
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vandy Vape
Type:
Price: 20.00

The Vandy Vape Pulse BF 80W Box Mod is made in collaboration with Tony B. to produce a lightweight, regulated squonk device utilizing Vandy Vape's proprietary chipset with 80W of maximum output and customizable temperature control settings.  A beautiful masterpiece catering to the rebuildable segment with a high-performance and fully regulated bottom-feeding box mod. The Pulse BF 80W is equipped with its own proprietary chipset, capable of firing up to 80W with full temperature control suite such as customizable curve output adjustments. The Pulse BF Regulated Mod can be utilized with a single 18650 battery with an included adapter or the longer-lasting 20700 battery for added versatility (batteries sold separately). The Pulse BF 80W implements interchangeable panels with beautiful designs ranging from carbon fiber to visually-striking resin-dyed colourways. The 8mL food-grade silicone squonk bottle can be assessed by removing the panel, offering an ergonomic experience when paired with today's top BF RDA’s.


Kit includes:
1x Pulse BF 80W Box Mod
1x 8mL Silicone Squonk Bottle
1x MicroUSB Cable
Instructional Manua

 

Features

  • Dimensions - 82mm by 54mm by 25.9mm

  • Vandy Vape's Advanced Chipset

  • Single High-Amp 20700 Batteries - Not

  • Included

  • Optional Single 18650 Platform - Adapter Included

  • Bottom-Feeding Squonk Design - 8mL Squeeze Bottle

  • Wattage Output Range: 5-80W

  • Voltage Output Range: 0-8.5V

  • Min Atomizer Resistance: 0.05ohm

  • Temperature Control Range: 200-600F

  • Supports Ni200 Nickel, Titanium, and Stainless Steel Heating Elements

  • Comprehensive TCR Adjustments

  • User Defined Temperature Control Mode

  • User Defined TC Curve Set Mode

  • Lightweight Nylon & ABS Construction

  • Intuitive 0.91 Inch OLED Display

  • Interchangeable Dual Magnetic Battery Panels

  • Tactile Firing Button

  • Dual Adjustment Buttons

  • Short Circuit Protection

  • Over-Heating Protection

  • Over-Current Protection

  • Overtime Protection

  • Open Circuit Protection

  • Low Battery Warning

  • MicroUSB Port - 1.5A Max Charge Current

  • Firmware Upgradeable

  • Squonk-Ready 510 Connection - Anti Leaking Securement

  • Carbon Fiber - Full Black, Black / Silver

  • Resin - Lava Red, Fantastic Blue, Seaweed Green, Aurora Rainbow
